Di Jatim, Surat Pencairan Dana dan Evaluasi APBD Dilakukan Secara Online
06 Nov 2019, 20:25 by Anik Hasanah


Di Jatim, Surat Pencairan Dana dan Evaluasi APBD Dilakukan Secara Online

KBRN, Surabaya : Pemprov Jatim melaunching aplikasi surat perintah pencairan dana (SP2D) secara Online, Paperless dan Digital Signing (OPD) serta E-Evaluasi APBD Kabupaten Kota se-Jawa Timur.Gubernur Jatim, Khofifah Indar Parawansa mengatakan, dengan aplikasi ini, diharapkan terkoneksi di masing masing daerah, dengan Pemprov. Hingga terbangun transparansi dan bisa diakses secara real time. "Antara lain adalah aplikasi SP2D online digital Shining dan evaluasi APBD Kabupaten Kota ini akan berharap bahwa koneksitas di antara perencanaan dan penganggaran, e planning dan e-budgeting secara regional Provinsi Jawa Timur bisa kita lakukan," ujarnya, Rabu (6/11/2019).Saat ini, kata Khofifah, baru 14 Kabupaten Kota yang sudah terintegrasi antara planning dan e-budgeting. Jadi masih ada Pekerjaan Rumah, bagi 24 Kabupaten Kota. Khofifah menyebut, secara APBD Jawa Timur ini ada 38 Kabupaten Kota."Sehingga terbesar di Indonesia,  sehingga presisi, akurasi dan akuntability dari perencanaan dan penganggaran ini akan terus disiapkan," tuturnya. Sementara itu, Kepala Badan Pengelola Keuangan dan Aset Daerah (BPKAD) Jatim, Jumadi menjelaskan, dipengelolaan keuangan daerah tidak hanya penganggaran. Tapi juga ada perbendaharaan. "Perbendaharaan ini yang selama ini otorisasi dan pencairan itu secara konvensional, itu kita lakukan langkah labgkah untuk efektif efisiennya seperti apa," terangnya. Diakuinya, untuk menerjakan SP2D bisa mencapai puluhan ribu, apalagi kalau di akhir tahun itu bisa numpuk. Oleh karena itu dengan sistem SP2D Online ini, yang paperless digital signing, mendesain untuk kecepatan untuk transparansi. "Karena penyedia barang bisa melihat. Misal rekanana A bisa melihat dengan izin dari pengguna anggaran, nomor SPM-nya berapa itu bisa dilihat," imbuhnya. Sistem ini, lanjutnya, terkoneksi dengan Bank Jatim dan sirupnya pengadaan barang dan jasa yang sekarang masih di Biro Administrasi Pembangunan."Kelebihannya juga bisa silakukan dimanapun, tidak di kantor, misal sedang bepergian ke Jakarta, Kepala OPD-nya, tetap bisa melakukan lewat smartphonenya. Ini nilai kelebihan dari aplikasi ini," tandasnya.

In East Java, Letters of Disbursement of Funds and Evaluation of Regional Budget are conducted online
Nov 6, 2019, 20:25 by Anik Hasanah


In East Java, Letters of Disbursement of Funds and Evaluation of Regional Budget are conducted online

KBRN, Surabaya: East Java Provincial Government launches an application for a letter disbursement (SP2D) Online, Paperless and Digital Signing (OPD) as well as E-Evaluation of APBD City Regency in East Java. Governor of East Java, Khofifah Indar Parawansa said, with this application, it is expected connected in each region, with the Provincial Government. So that transparency is established and can be accessed in real time. "Among other things, the digital online SP2D Shining application and the APBD evaluation of the City Regency will hope that the connectivity between regional planning and budgeting, e planning and e-budgeting in East Java Province can be done," he said, Wednesday (6/11/2019) ). At present, said Khofifah, only 14 City Districts have been integrated between planning and e-budgeting. So there is still Homework, for 24 Regency Cities. Khofifah said, in East Java's Regional Budget there were 38 City Regencies. "So that it is the largest in Indonesia, so that the precision, accuracy and accountability of planning and budgeting will continue to be prepared," he said. Meanwhile, the Head of the East Java Regional Financial and Asset Management Agency (BPKAD), Jumadi explained, regional financial management is not just budgeting. But there is also a treasury. "This treasury, which has been conventionally authorizing and disbursing it, is what we are doing to make it effective to be as efficient as it is," he explained. He admitted, to deliver SP2D could reach tens of thousands, especially if at the end of the year it could pile up. Therefore with this SP2D Online system, which is paperless digital signing, designing for speed for transparency. "Because the supplier of goods can see. For example, account A can see with permission from the budget user, how many SPM numbers can it be seen," he added. This system, he continued, is connected to the Bank of East Java and the syrup of procurement of goods and services which is still in the Development Administration Bureau. "The advantages can also be done anywhere, not in the office, for example while traveling to Jakarta, the Head of the OPD, can still do it through his smartphone. "This is an excess value from this application," he said.
